titleStmt.title: A reply to the reflector, on the Gloucester-Shire petition in behalf of the suspended bishops, and to the examiner of the suspended bishop's case. By the author of the apology, &c.

notesStmt.note: Quire D (pp. 17-24, 29-30) contains an extra leaf. Quire E missing in signature only. Text is continuous despite signatures and pagination.
Imperfect; pages have faded print and print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
